Metadata.name: Useful Calendar - No Spoilers
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
===Enable only ONE Useful Calendar package!===
Adds additional in-game event dates to the calendar:
-Bookstore restocked -Croco Fur restocked -Bulletin Board updated -Crane Game restocked -New S. Link available
This version does not contain any story spoilers and is recommended for first-time players.
